Author: bathroomhaunt
Text: i do the same thing lol. i’ve always drank a lot of water but now i have to drink whenever i eat anything and i usually finish off like a liter bc i feel that it’ll make me feel more “full” and i’ll eat less. it weirds me out when i eat with my best friend bc she doesn’t drink any water when she’s eating ever

Author: patri3110
Text: Yep I go through the same I cannot eat without drinking
